name: Divided and Conquered
description:
Your company is about to go out of business, you are low on money, and to make matters worse, all of your employees are lazy good-for-nothings who would rather get distracted than do anything productive. It is your job to get them in line and back to work!

Navigate using the arrow keys.
Assign tasks to groups by clicking on them.

Credits :
Programming : Bernese
Music : VeryTori
Art : undercat39, orbitalshocktrooper
